name: Reincarnation of Ocean
description:
It tells the story of Prince Elves from Eulus who went to the sea to experience battles and adventures, constantly breaking through himself.

Features of this work
■After defeating monsters, gems will be dropped. Use gems to strengthen yourself endlessly!
■A simple and easy-to-understand upgrade!

It's easy to understand, even players who are in contact for the first time can quickly upgrade and become more powerful!
